articles.description: Hamilton was embroiled in a side-by-side battle with Leclerc at last week's race at Silverstone, and following the tussle the seven-time champion called the Ferrari driver 'very sensible'.
articles.content: Max Verstappen has hit back at F1 rival Lewis Hamilton following claims from the British driver that racing 'sensible' Charles Leclerc is 'very different' than battles with his Dutch rival, by saying… [+2979 chars]

articles.title: Jake Paul Still Down To Fight Tommy Fury After He Beats Hasim Rahman Jr. | TMZ Sports - TMZSports
articles.description: Despite the Jake Paul vs. Tommy Fury fight falling apart for the second time, The Problem Child tells TMZ Sports he STILL wants to beat the pugilist reality ...
